title: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work.
description: Bug 116609[Regression]Color orange doesn't work. Description:Color orange doesn't work.Steps to reproduce:1.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange for a report item, the color does not update as expected.
EB: The report item should display in the color orange when the color or background color is set to orange.
SR:
1. Insert a report item.
2. Set the color or background color to orange.
3. Verify that the report item is displayed in the color orange.
